column3:
The character following a octal string sequence was skipped.
Writing a test is a bit problematic due to 'hardcoded' call to
GitConfigUtil.getFileNameEncoding().
Thank you for the contribution. It is not entirely correct though: "i--" should happen in both possible branches of this inner "if" statement, e.g. right before "assert n == b.length;".
Anyway, I've applied the correct fix to encoding problem. Please see detailed explanation here: #123
